lines.text:
[to Boy after he trips on a vine]
Vine in tree friend to the hand, but vine on ground enemy
A hunter can make many mistakes... the hunter can make only one... and that one is always fatal.
Ah, yes, my friend, but to whom is it fatal?

[about Cheetah]
Chimp is smart, n'est-ce pas? And valuable!

[to Jane]
I talk with any man that stops hunters that kill animals.
He who hunts in jungle is in turn hunted.
